intro: Psychotria rigida var. aurata, commonly known as the golden psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking yellow flowers, which contrast with its dark green foliage. It typically grows as an erect shrub, reaching heights of up to 1.5 meters. The leaves are usually elliptical in shape and have a smooth, glossy surface.
